blog.title: Learn Web Programming From Scratch. Via The Internet, Youtube, etc.

content.html:
If you are interested in Web Programming, but don't know where to start. This article might be for you. In this article there are several YouTube Channels, Websites that explain Web Programming for beginners. First you should know what HTML, CSS, and Javascript are, because they are all interrelated. To find out what HTML, CSS, and Javascript are, you can visit the w3schools website. Actually, you can also directly learn through the website. But in this article, you will get some YouTube channels, as well as websites that provide lessons about Web Programming.

A road map for those of you who learn to use Indonesian.

Youtube Channel for Learning

1. Web Programming UNPAS

Web Programming UNPAS has more than 500 thousand subscribers. On this channel you can learn about HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and more. Video playlists for you to study :

1. HTML Dasar

2. Belajar HTML 5

3. CSS Dasar

4. CSS Layouting

5. CSS 3

6. Dasar Pemrograman Javascript

This playlist might help you in learning. For more details, you can check directly on the Web Programming UNPAS YouTube channel.

2. Sekolah Koding

Sekolah Koding has more than 100 thousand subscribers. On this channel you can learn about HTML, CSS, Javascript and more. Video playlists for you to study :

1. Belajar HTML dari Dasar

2. Mengenal HTML 5

3. Belajar CSS dari Dasar

4. Belajar CSS 3

5. Belajar Javascript untuk Pemula

Maybe there are still many other YouTube channels. But to learn HTML, CSS, and Javascript. The two channels are sufficient.

Website for Learning

1. Code Politan

2. Petani Kode

3. Malas Ngoding

4. Sekolah Koding

Of the many existing websites, only 4 of these websites that I provide, because learning on these websites is free.

A road map for those of you who learn to use English.

Youtube Channel for Learning

1. HTML and CSS Course - Begginer to Pro (SuperSimpleDev)

2. Learn HTML - Full Tutorial for Bergginers (freeCodeCamp.org)

3. Learn HTML 5 and CSS 3 from Scratch (freeCodeCamp.org)

4. Learn Javascript Fullscourse (freeCodeCamp.org)

If you want to find programming tutorials in English. There will be lots of them, so maybe the above channel is enough to help you learn.

Website for Learning

1. w3schools

2. Sololearn

3. freeCodeCamp

4. Web.dev

So those were some YouTube channels and websites that you can visit to learn about Web Programming, for those of you who are beginners.

Maybe this article is enough. Hope it helps you in studying. Thanks.

ini code
content.markdown:
If you are interested in **Web Programming**, but don't know where to start. This article might be for you. In this article there are several YouTube Channels, Websites that explain **Web Programming** for**beginners**. First you should know what _HTML_, _CSS_, and _Javascript_ are, because they are all interrelated. To find out what _HTML_, _CSS_, and _Javascript_ are, you can visit the [w3schools](https://www.w3schools.com/ "https://www.w3schools.com/") website. Actually, you can also directly learn through the website. But in this article, you will get some YouTube channels, as well as websites that provide lessons about Web Programming.



### **A road map for those of you who learn to use Indonesian.**



#### **Youtube Channel for Learning**



##### **1. Web Programming UNPAS**

[Web Programming UNPAS](https://www.youtube.com/@sandhikagalihWPU "https://www.youtube.com/@sandhikagalihWPU") has more than 500 thousand subscribers. On this channel you can learn about HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, and more. Video playlists for you to study :

**1.**[**HTML Dasar**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIVuONHysfOK0ZtiqUWvrx4F "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIVuONHysfOK0ZtiqUWvrx4F")

**2.**[**Belajar HTML 5**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIX-K5eeHRImnZhPUMhsw9A7 "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIX-K5eeHRImnZhPUMhsw9A7")

**3.**[**CSS Dasar**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIUBrbm6Gdh6k7ZUvPIAZm7p "https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIUBrbm6Gdh6k7ZUvPIAZm7p")

**4.**[**CSS Layouting**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIUu4Ju9GUL5zpLcuq08TKYr "https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIUu4Ju9GUL5zpLcuq08TKYr")

**5.**[**CSS 3**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIVCmrSWbZPKCccCkfFw-Naa "https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIVCmrSWbZPKCccCkfFw-Naa")

**6.**[**Dasar Pemrograman Javascript**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIWXagluzROrA-iBY9eeUt4w "https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFIM0718LjIWXagluzROrA-iBY9eeUt4w")

This playlist might help you in learning. For more details, you can check directly on the [Web Programming UNPAS](https://www.youtube.com/@sandhikagalihWPU "https://www.youtube.com/@sandhikagalihWPU") YouTube channel.



##### **2. Sekolah Koding**

[Sekolah Koding](https://www.youtube.com/c/SekolahKoding "https://www.youtube.com/c/SekolahKoding") has more than 100 thousand subscribers. On this channel you can learn about HTML, CSS, Javascript and more. Video playlists for you to study :

**1.**[**Belajar HTML dari Dasar**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXC9ojTmU95BRefbJoi4clY- "https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXC9ojTmU95BRefbJoi4clY-")

**2.**[**Mengenal HTML 5**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXBPga_3SQ_KwLtAYItgn490 "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXBPga_3SQ_KwLtAYItgn490")

**3.**[**Belajar CSS dari Dasar**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAvVZ1Wb1D7HVAPNJGk4f-G "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAvVZ1Wb1D7HVAPNJGk4f-G")****

**4.**[**Belajar CSS 3**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAcU8NqgbY065mo9Sho-5Tc "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAcU8NqgbY065mo9Sho-5Tc")

**5.**[**Belajar Javascript untuk Pemula**](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAiH1acKFPx8EtpJAq44gjP "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZlgfAG0GXAiH1acKFPx8EtpJAq44gjP")

Maybe there are still many other YouTube channels. But to learn _HTML_, _CSS_, and _Javascript_. The two channels are sufficient.



#### **Website for Learning**

**1.**[**Code Politan**](https://www.codepolitan.com/ "https://www.codepolitan.com/")

**2.**[**Petani Kode**](https://www.petanikode.com/ "https://www.petanikode.com/")

**3.**[**Malas Ngoding**](https://www.malasngoding.com/ "https://www.malasngoding.com/")

**4.**[**Sekolah Koding**](https://sekolahkoding.com "https://sekolahkoding.com")

Of the many existing websites, only 4 of these websites that I provide, because learning on these websites is free.



### **A road map for those of you who learn to use English.**

#### **Youtube Channel for Learning**

**1.**[**HTML and CSS Course - Begginer to Pro (SuperSimpleDev)**](https://youtu.be/G3e-cpL7ofc "https://youtu.be/G3e-cpL7ofc")

**2.**[**Learn HTML - Full Tutorial for Bergginers (freeCodeCamp.org)**](https://youtu.be/kUMe1FH4CHE "https://youtu.be/kUMe1FH4CHE")

**3.**[**Learn HTML 5 and CSS 3 from Scratch (freeCodeCamp.org)**](https://youtu.be/mU6anWqZJcc "https://youtu.be/mU6anWqZJcc")

**4.**[**Learn Javascript Fullscourse (freeCodeCamp.org)**](https://youtu.be/PkZNo7MFNFg "https://youtu.be/PkZNo7MFNFg")

If you want to find programming tutorials in English. There will be lots of them, so maybe the above channel is enough to help you learn.



#### **Website for Learning**

**1.**[**w3schools**](https://www.w3schools.com/ "https://www.w3schools.com/")

**2.**[**Sololearn**](https://sololearn.com "https://sololearn.com")

**3.**[**freeCodeCamp**](https://freecodecamp.org "https://freecodecamp.org")

**4.**[**Web.dev**](https://www.web.dev "https://www.web.dev")



So those were some YouTube channels and websites that you can visit to learn about **Web Programming**, for those of you who are beginners.

Maybe this article is enough. Hope it helps you in studying. Thanks.

`ini code`
